title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Afghanistan 2024
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing GDP in billion U.S. dollars, containing a total of 21 data points.
Overall GDP in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
GDP in billion U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 2004 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2020, and lastly roughly increasing from 2020 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum GDP in billion U.S. dollars, about 25.19 was reported at Year 2024
Minimum GDP in billion U.S. dollars about 5.15 was reached at Year 2004
